name: beyond-science-reading-ebook-builder
description: Beyond the Science of Reading 电子书构建工具

scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && npm run check-deps
scripts.check-deps: node -e "console.log('检查系统依赖...'); try { require('child_process').execSync('pandoc --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); console.log('✅ Pandoc 已安装'); } catch(e) { console.log('❌ 请安装 Pandoc: brew install pandoc'); } try { require('child_process').execSync('calibre --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); console.log('✅ Calibre 已安装'); } catch(e) { console.log('⚠️  Calibre 未安装，无法生成 MOBI 格式: brew install --cask calibre'); }"

author: Beyond the Science of Reading Translation Project
